document_data.name: Fleebo
document_data.mainbody:
'''Fleebo''' was a bandit who preyed upon the [[Trade Way]] north of [[Zazesspur]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{TOC limit}}
document_data.Personality: Fleebo was among the bravest of his companions—or perhaps the most foolish.
document_data.Possessions: The bandit possessed a [[shortbow]] and rode on [[horse]]back.
document_data.History: In the spring of the {{YearlinkName|1366}}, Fleebo was a member of a band of robbers who happened to stop an extended family of foresters from [[Forest of Tethir|Tethir]] led by a man named [[Wyancott]]. While the leader of the bandits questioned Wyancott, [[Star Protective Services]] arrived to rescue them. When he stood atop a wagon and aimed his weapon at [[Zaranda Star]], Fleebo was shot dead by an [[arrow]] through his forehead from [[Vander Stillhawk]]. Zaranda then used his dead body in a failed attempt to teach her ward [[Chenowyn]] about death.
